title: Magnanimous! Magnum Sound Pack
description: Complete your hand-cannon experience with some beefy sound effects to drive home the 'punch' when you're punching holes through the enemy.
longDescription:
Join the Discord server for discounts, support, and discussion: https://discord.gg/CvV2MHk


Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=fBO_taV3uRw&feature=youtu.be


Complete your hand-cannon experience with some beefy sound effects to drive home the 'punch' when you're punching holes through the enemy. This sound pack contains sounds for revolvers and magazine fed weapons alike. Every sound effect is composed of multiple takes being selected by a randomizer.


Sound FX (with number of takes):

MagnumFire_01 x 3

MagnumFire_02 x 4

MagnumFire_03 x 4

BulletIn x 5

Cocking x 3

DryFire x 3

EjectCasings x 3

MagazineIn x 3

MagazineOut x 3

SlideForward x 3

SlideBackward x 3


Don't forget to leave a rating and have a nice day!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Every sound cue is set up with using multiple takes to prevent identifiable repeating sound
  •  Good for both revolvers and magazine fed weapons

Number of Audio Waves: 37

Number of Audio Cues: 11

Sample rate: 44.1 kHz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Seconds of audio provided: 41

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows
